content.raw:
Yes, we do have the `codecheck` target in ign-cmake, but only the pipeline is using it; the jenkins job still uses code_check.sh so it can generate xml output.

I have a branch of ign-cmake that makes a `codecheck_xml` target, and I've tested it locally, but I haven't yet tested it in CI

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/branch/codecheck_xml
content.html:
Yes, we do have the codecheck target in ign-cmake, but only the pipeline is using it; the jenkins job still uses code_check.sh so it can generate xml output.

I have a branch of ign-cmake that makes a codecheck_xml target, and I've tested it locally, but I haven't yet tested it in CI

  • https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/branch/codecheck_xml
